Bonito is not a city of much commerce, but is a refuge for city dwellers.
From Recife, go west on route 232 for an hour and 20 minutes, then in Bezerros at the 3rd exit, take route 103 and go south for 25 minutes.
The people mostly walk within Bonito, take a mototaxi, or bus to other cities
See the waterfalls, EcoParque or Ecological Park, Japanese Colony which grows flowers, Pedra de Rodeadoura where a battle took place, Natural Reserve Mucuri
Visit the waterfalls, visit with the people
Get out rested and relaxed and make sure to come back for more another time
